text: On the iHeartRadio Music Awards 2018, the “ Havana ” singer appeared on the purple carpet sporting a graphic pencil skirt, bodysuit with a plunging neckline and a black sheer prime. The sheer layer featured a excessive neckline that would both be hooked up or an added extensive, black and white choker. Her general look is daring, however it was her choker that grabbed our consideration. We first noticed the influence of chokers again in 2015, when celebs like Kim Kardashian and Rihanna introduced again the ’ 90s fashion. As a flattering, sultry addition to any outfit, it shortly gained momentum. Nevertheless, now, we have been ready for somebody to offer new power to development.
